name: Cfml-liquid
body:
This project aims to port the [Liquid Templating Language](https://github.com/Shopify/liquid) over to [CFML](http://www.getrailo.org/). For the port I'm using the [PHP port](https://github.com/harrydeluxe/php-liquid) of the language. How To Use ========== ```coldfusion

{{ pageTitle }}

{% if query.size %}
    {%for item in query%}
  • {{item.project}} - {{ item.link }}
    • {%endfor%}
{% else%}

No records found

{% endif %} #template.render(assigns)# #cfcatch.message# ``` would produce ```html

ColdFusion Frameworks on Github

  • CFWheels - https://github.com/cfwheels/cfwheels
  • ColdMVC - https://github.com/tonynelson19/ColdMVC
  • FW/1 - https://github.com/seancorfield/fw1
  • Fusebox - https://github.com/fusebox-framework/Fusebox-ColdFusion
``` More examples and information can be found in the original [Liquid documentation](https://github.com/Shopify/liquid/wiki/Liquid-for-Designers) Currect State ============= Currently this project is in a state that I'm happy with. As a result, I will be focusing my attention on [CFWheels](https://github.com/cfwheels/cfwheels). If you would like to take over the project as the maintainer, please contact me through github. What's left to do ================= I was going to add caching but I'm deciding against it as (from what I can tell) the original Liquid library doesn't have it. Feel free to implement it if you desire. Running Tests ============= Tests are written using the [RocketUnit framework](http://rocketunit.riaforge.org/). To run the tests first clone the project into a directory off your webroot called `cfml-liquid`. Next point your browser to `http://localhost/cfml-liquid/tests`. Issues and Enhancements ==================== I will be taking issues requests until the project is passed to a maintainer. Please file your issues in the issue tracker for this repo. I will **not** be taking enhancement requests. If there is something that you want added to the project, please fork the project, code the enhancement and send me a pull requst.
tagline: a port of the liquid templating language to coldfusion
